trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> that is obtained during the workflow compilation process.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"> </xref> ，在工作流程編譯處理程序期間取得。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the instance to define the source file name and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化執行個體來定義原始程式檔名稱和<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the source file that has the error.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含具有錯誤的原始程式檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"> </xref>要與這個執行個體產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: exception is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: exception為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Includes initialization for several properties which define the error.
trans-unit.target: 包含數個屬性定義錯誤的初始化。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the source file that has the error.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含具有錯誤的原始程式檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the line number of the error.
trans-unit.target: 表示錯誤的行號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the column position of the start of the error.
trans-unit.target: 表示錯誤開始的資料行位置的整數。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error number.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含錯誤號碼。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains text which describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含描述錯誤的文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the property associated with the compiler error.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與編譯器錯誤相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value that is returned by this property is used to map and navigate to the property that caused the compilation failure.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的值用來對應並巡覽至導致編譯失敗的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property associated with the compiler error.
trans-unit.target: 與編譯器錯誤相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides a string which represents this instance.
trans-unit.target: 提供代表這個執行個體的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string which represents this instance/
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示這個執行個體 /

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> which can be accessed to read and write user-defined data associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>來讀取和寫入與這個執行個體相關聯的使用者定義資料存取哪一個。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> which can be accessed to read and write user-defined data associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>來讀取和寫入與這個執行個體相關聯的使用者定義資料存取哪一個。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
